name: Easy Status Saver
description: Apps Moto  **Use it without fearing about your privacy to save and share Whatsapp Statuses as your privacy is our ultimate priority** This app doesnt keep any kind of hidden track of users personal information Least possible but required permissions have been used to give user the maximum quality experience  How to Use It? 1. Install and Open the Easy Status Saver app to download Whatsapp Statuses 2. It will provide you with 2 tabs i) Images ii) Videos 3. Click on Save to save the status in gallery in Status Saver folder 4. Click on Share to share the status on external apps with others  Features: The app lets you save Whatsapp statuses of all types (Images, Gifs and Videos)  Simplest design  Least permissions granted  Works offline without internet  Easy & Fast Saving  Easy and fast Sharing option to other apps without saving  Built in Image Viewer & Video Player  Easy Swiping through statuses  Disclaimer:  This app is not affiliated with or sponsored by Whatsapp Inc.  It just helps to save Whatsapp status but not linked to Whatsapp Inc. by any means  Please seek permission before sharing others statuses   Thanks for downloading and please provide a valuable feedback
